resources.string: Please choose a site you want to follow to view the streamflow data
RIO PUEBLO DE TAOS NEAR TAOS, NM
Click to View the line graph

The USGS investigates the occurrence, quantity, quality, distribution, and movement of surface and underground waters and disseminates the data to the public, and other Federal agencies involved with managing water resources. \n\nData are collected by field personnel or satellites to offices where it is stored and processed. USGS finalizes data at individual sites on a continuous basis as environmental conditions and hydrologic characteristics permit.
